statements: SELECT * FROM optimized_data_storage ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, data1 FROM optimized_data_storage WHERE index1 = 123;
SELECT data2, index2 FROM optimized_data_storage WHERE data1 LIKE '%example%';
SELECT * FROM optimized_data_storage WHERE id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT id, data1, index1 FROM optimized_data_storage WHERE index2 > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM optimized_data_storage WHERE id = 10;
SELECT data1, index1 FROM optimized_data_storage WHERE index1 > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT data1, data2 FROM optimized_data_storage WHERE index2 < '2022-06-30 23:59:59' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, data1, data2 FROM optimized_data_storage WHERE index1 IS NOT NULL AND index2 IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, data1, data2, index1, index2 FROM optimized_data_storage WHERE id BETWEEN 5 AND 15;
SELECT * FROM Table1 WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, age FROM Table1 WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, email FROM Table2 WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM Table1, Table2 WHERE Table1.id = Table2.id;
SELECT MAX(salary) AS max_salary FROM Table2;
SELECT * FROM Table1 WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT id, name FROM Table1 WHERE age < 25 ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM Table2 WHERE salary >= 5000.00 AND email LIKE '%@example.com%'
SELECT id, name, age FROM Table1 WHERE id = 3 AND age BETWEEN 20 AND 40
SELECT id, email FROM Table2 WHERE salary < 10000.00 ORDER BY email
SELECT * FROM optimizing_data_storage;
SELECT name, age FROM optimizing_data_storage WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, name, age FROM optimizing_data_storage WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT name, created_at FROM optimizing_data_storage WHERE age < 25 ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT id, data, category FROM large_scale_dataset WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT name, age FROM optimizing_data_storage WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, query, execution_time FROM query_performance ORDER BY execution_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM large_scale_dataset WHERE category = 'analysis' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 20;
SELECT id, data FROM large_scale_dataset WHERE category = 'report' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 15;
SELECT id, name, age, created_at FROM optimizing_data_storage WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY age ASC LIMIT 8;
SELECT * FROM data_storage;
SELECT data, index_name FROM data_storage WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM retrieval_processes ORDER BY process_name DESC;
SELECT process_name, process_type FROM retrieval_processes WHERE process_type = 'batch';
SELECT query_name, execution_time FROM query_performance WHERE execution_time > 100 ORDER BY execution_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM data_storage ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT data, index_name FROM data_storage WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM retrieval_processes WHERE process_type = 'search' ORDER BY process_name ASC;
SELECT index_type, creation_date FROM indexes WHERE index_type LIKE '%text%' ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT query_id, query_name, execution_time FROM query_performance WHERE execution_time > 100 ORDER BY query_id;
SELECT * FROM Table1;
SELECT column1, column2 FROM Table2 WHERE age > 30;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Table5 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT event_timestamp, event_type FROM Table3 WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY event_timestamp ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM Table4;
SELECT column1, column2 FROM Table1;
SELECT name, age FROM Table2 WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT user_id, event_type, event_timestamp FROM Table3 WHERE event_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY event_timestamp ASC;
SELECT product_name, price, product_id FROM Table5 WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC, product_name ASC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date FROM Table4 WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY order_date DESC, order_id ASC;
